name: ADMIN_ROLE
signature: function ADMIN_ROLE() view returns (bytes32)

name: DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE
signature: function DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE() view returns (bytes32)

name: adminSearchByCourse
signature: function adminSearchByCourse(string _keyword) view returns ((bytes32 certHash, address issuer, string issuerName, address student, string studentName, string courseName, string courseType, string courseLevel, uint256 issuedDate, string metadataURI)[] listCertificates, uint256 total)

name: adminSearchByCourseLevel
signature: function adminSearchByCourseLevel(string _keyword) view returns ((bytes32 certHash, address issuer, string issuerName, address student, string studentName, string courseName, string courseType, string courseLevel, uint256 issuedDate, string metadataURI)[] listCertificates, uint256 total)

name: adminSearchByCourseType
signature: function adminSearchByCourseType(string _keyword) view returns ((bytes32 certHash, address issuer, string issuerName, address student, string studentName, string courseName, string courseType, string courseLevel, uint256 issuedDate, string metadataURI)[] listCertificates, uint256 total)

name: adminSearchByDate
signature: function adminSearchByDate(uint256 _fromDate, uint256 _toDate) view returns ((bytes32 certHash, address issuer, string issuerName, address student, string studentName, string courseName, string courseType, string courseLevel, uint256 issuedDate, string metadataURI)[] listCertificates, uint256 total)

name: adminSearchByStudentName
signature: function adminSearchByStudentName(string _keyword) view returns ((bytes32 certHash, address issuer, string issuerName, address student, string studentName, string courseName, string courseType, string courseLevel, uint256 issuedDate, string metadataURI)[] listCertificates, uint256 total)

name: getAllCertificates
signature: function getAllCertificates() view returns ((bytes32 certHash, address issuer, string issuerName, address student, string studentName, string courseName, string courseType, string courseLevel, uint256 issuedDate, string metadataURI)[] listCertificates, uint256 total)

name: getCertificateByHash
signature: function getCertificateByHash(bytes32 _certHash) view returns ((bytes32 certHash, address issuer, string issuerName, address student, string studentName, string courseName, string courseType, string courseLevel, uint256 issuedDate, string metadataURI))

name: getRoleAdmin
signature: function getRoleAdmin(bytes32 role) view returns (bytes32)

name: getStudentCertificateByCourseLevel
signature: function getStudentCertificateByCourseLevel(address _student, string _keyword) view returns ((bytes32 certHash, address issuer, string issuerName, address student, string studentName, string courseName, string courseType, string courseLevel, uint256 issuedDate, string metadataURI)[] listCertificates, uint256 total)

name: getStudentCertificateByCourseName
signature: function getStudentCertificateByCourseName(address _student, string _keyword) view returns ((bytes32 certHash, address issuer, string issuerName, address student, string studentName, string courseName, string courseType, string courseLevel, uint256 issuedDate, string metadataURI)[] listCertificates, uint256 total)

name: getStudentCertificateByCourseType
signature: function getStudentCertificateByCourseType(address _student, string _keyword) view returns ((bytes32 certHash, address issuer, string issuerName, address student, string studentName, string courseName, string courseType, string courseLevel, uint256 issuedDate, string metadataURI)[] listCertificates, uint256 total)

name: getStudentCertificateByDate
signature: function getStudentCertificateByDate(address _student, uint256 _fromDate, uint256 _toDate) view returns ((bytes32 certHash, address issuer, string issuerName, address student, string studentName, string courseName, string courseType, string courseLevel, uint256 issuedDate, string metadataURI)[] listCertificates, uint256 total)

name: getStudentCertificateByHash
signature: function getStudentCertificateByHash(address _student, bytes32 _certHash) view returns ((bytes32 certHash, address issuer, string issuerName, address student, string studentName, string courseName, string courseType, string courseLevel, uint256 issuedDate, string metadataURI) certificate)

name: getStudentCertificatesByStudent
signature: function getStudentCertificatesByStudent(address _student) view returns ((bytes32 certHash, address issuer, string issuerName, address student, string studentName, string courseName, string courseType, string courseLevel, uint256 issuedDate, string metadataURI)[] listCertificates, uint256 total)

name: grantRole
signature: function grantRole(bytes32 role, address account)

name: hasRole
signature: function hasRole(bytes32 role, address account) view returns (bool)

name: issueCertificate
signature: function issueCertificate(address _student, string _studentName, address _issuer, string _issuerName, string _courseName, string _courseType, string _courseLevel, string _metadataURI) returns (bytes32)

name: renounceRole
signature: function renounceRole(bytes32 role, address callerConfirmation)

name: revokeRole
signature: function revokeRole(bytes32 role, address account)

name: supportsInterface
signature: function supportsInterface(bytes4 interfaceId) view returns (bool)
